about_the_game:
The RealFlight 2024 Year Content Pass gets you access to all RealFlight DLC for 2024, the moment it is released.

All 2024 content is now released and unlocked!

2024 Quarterly Content Pack 1

  • E-flite Air Tractor 1.5m

  • E-flite Commander mPd 1.4m

  • E-flite UMX WACO

  • E-flite Valiant 1.3m

  • Tower Hobbies ASW 28 2.0m

  • ViperJet 3.5m/138” Turbine Jet

2024 Quarterly Content Pack 2

  • Blade Eclipse 360

  • E-flite Cherokee 1.3m

  • E-flite Turbo Timber SWS 2.0m

  • E-flite UMX Conscendo

  • Triple Tree Float Flight Line (PhotoField Airport)

2024 Quarterly Content Pack 3

  • E-flite Decathlon RJG 1.2m

  • E-flite Micro DRACO 800mm

  • E-flite Super Timber 1.7m

  • E-flite UMX F-86 Sabre 30mm EDF

  • E-flite UMX P-51D Detroit Miss

  • Hangar 9 Aermacchi MB-339 60-86N Scale Military Turbine

2024 Quarterly Content Pack 4

  • E-flite Extra 330 SC 1.3m

  • E-flite UMX Me 262 Twin 30mm EDF

  • E-flite Viper 64mm EDF

  • Hangar 9 OV-10 Bronco 20cc

  • AMA Flying Site 1 (PhotoField Airport)

The RealFlight 2024 Year Content Pass gets you access to all RealFlight DLC for 2024, the moment it is released.

All 2024 content is now released and unlocked!
